name: ThinkaforKNX
0:
”Alexa, turn on the ceiling lights”
”Alexa, set the heating to 19 degrees”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
This SmartHome skill allows you to use Alexa to control your home with your Thinka for KNX (https://thinka.eu)

Using Alexa you can control your lights, switches, thermostats, blinds and curtains.

Enable the Thinka skill and follow the instructions. You will need to provide a "pairing code" from your Thinka's support page to enable the skill.
